byline.contributor: Majd Al Waheidi reported from Gaza, and Isabel Kershner from Jerusalem.
byline.original: By MAJD AL WAHEIDI and ISABEL KERSHNER

abstract: Younis Hounor, local leader of extremist Islamist splinter group in Gaza, is shot to death by Hamas; death ratchets tensions in Gaza as Hamas has been cracking down on radical jihadists.
lead_paragraph: The fatal shooting came amid a campaign by Hamas to crack down on groups that follow the more radical Salafist stream of Islam, some of whom now adhere to the Islamic State.

headline.main: Hamas Forces Kill Leader of Islamic Splinter Group in Gaza
headline.print_headline: Hamas Fatally Shoots a Leader of Islamic Extremists in Gaza

snippet: The fatal shooting came amid a campaign by Hamas to crack down on groups that follow the more radical Salafist stream of Islam, some of whom now adhere to the Islamic State.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
